docs.snippet: President Barack Obama designated two national monuments Wednesday at sites in Utah and Nevada that have become key flashpoints over use of public land in the U.S. West, marking the administration's latest move to protect environmentally sensitive...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama designated two national monuments Wednesday at sites in Utah and Nevada that have become key flashpoints over use of public land in the U.S. West, marking the administration's latest move to protect environmentally sensitive areas in its final days.

headline.main: Obama Names Utah, Nevada Monuments Despite GOP Opposition
headline.print_headline: Obama Names Utah, Nevada Monuments Despite GOP Opposition

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from Washington and Dai Wakabayashi from San Francisco. Rachel Shorey contributed research.

docs.snippet: Compare President Obama’s treatment of Donald Trump to Pat McCrory’s behavior in North Carolina....
docs.lead_paragraph: Compare President Obama’s treatment of Donald Trump to Pat McCrory’s behavior in North Carolina.
docs.abstract: David Leonhardt Op-Ed column contrasts strategies of Republican North Carolina Gov Pat McCrory in his re-election bid and Pres Barack Obama campaigning on behalf of Hillary Clinton in presidential race; suggests Democrats' adherence to decorum and fairness makes them easy prey for cynical Republicans willing to win power by any means necessary.

headline.main: Democrats Had a Knife, and the G.O.P. Had a Gun
headline.print_headline: Democrats  Had a Knife,  G.O.P. a Gun

headline.main: President Obama Starts Day With Workout on Hawaii Vacation

docs.snippet: After weeks of giving only brief comments to the media, Donald Trump made a series of public statements Wednesday, applauding the return of 8,000 jobs to the U.S. and hailing his discussions with President Barack Obama....
